attributes.action: abolish the complicated tax credit system, and instead replace it with a lower income tax band for those currently in receipt of tax credits, thus eliminating overpayments
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current tax credit system is flawed.  If income tax was lowered for those currently in receipt of tax credits, there would no longer be overpayment errors.  Families would not be faced with unexpected debts.
